Name: Wild Promenade Cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
MUDDLE cucumber and raspberries in base of shaker.
Add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
Review: Rich raspberry with green hints of cucumber.
History: Created in 2002 by Mehdi Otmann at The Player in London, England.
